subject: Never received my order.
description_text:
Order # ssn2785 , ordered on September 30, 2025. (Express shipping) Never
made it to the doyline post office, neither did it  make it to my P.O Box
192 71023.Today at 8:25pm MONDAY October 20, that's a lot of time,  not at
all a happy customer.  You can not treat people like this. Your customer
service, you must know,,,,,,,,,. Not cool not cool, but not cool. Thanks!
For returning my money, for a product I never received. And my time of
waiting not cool not cool.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5184 中
